text: Here's how to change
your YouTube profile picture.
First, using your computer,
go to YouTube.com in your web browser.

Then, click on your profile
icon in the top-right corner

and select "Settings"
under the pull-down window.

Next, click on your profile
icon in your channel section.
Now, click your profile icon again.
This will bring you to the
"Channel customization" page on YouTube.

Next, click "CHANGE" in the
"Profile picture" section.

Select the new photo you
want to use and click "Open."

Now you can customize the
profile photo that you selected,
and then click "Done."

And the final step is
to just click "Publish."
This will finalize your changes.
All right, now let's do the same thing
using a mobile device.

In your YouTube app or
the YouTube Studio app,

click on your profile icon
in the top-right corner.
Click "Manage your Google Account."

This will open your
Google account settings.
Click on your icon again,
and then click "Set Profile Photo."
You can choose to take a photo
or choose a photo from your device.

For this example, we're going
to select choose a photo.
Then find the photo you want to use.

You also have the option
to crop the image.
When you're done, click "ACCEPT."

Congratulations. Your
profile photo is now changed.
One thing to take note of
is that your YouTube picture
is linked to your Google accounts,

and changes to your profile
picture will be updated

across all your Google products,
like Gmail and Google Docs.
